reference.title: cxxFile module
reference.shortdesc: The cxxFile module defines a top-level container for all the elements necessary to describe the global APIs of a component

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFile> topic type contains elements necessary to show the name of the file, and also the global variables, functions, defines, enumerations and typedefs contained within.
The cxxFile topic contains the following elements:
